subject: Grants (Corporate and Foundation)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong said he had received “high interest” from sponsors willing to back his team if he took control of the financially strapped Astana. He indicated the sponsor would come from a United States-based multinational company.
